name: One Center
description: One Center is our adult day program that provides a wide variety of support and services for adults with developmental disabilities and traumatic and acquired brain injuries. Participants in One Center are encouraged to establish goals and continue to enrich their lives through our lifelong learning approach. Center staff work collaboratively with our participants, their family, and the community to identify what is important to each individual. Participants have the opportunity to select from a
